page_content: The page discusses the creation and implementation of a German language teaching tool called "Lesewelten" for secondary schools, focusing on literary reading and learning. It includes details about the concept, financial aspects, and project structure.

The page describes the "mein Kulturerbe vor der Haustür" project, a platform for sharing personal memories, discoveries, and wishes related to cultural heritage. It includes details about participation, project ideas, and educational resources.

The page provides comprehensive information and guidance to municipalities on waste management and disposal of household waste. It includes details on community counseling, waste disposal, biogenic waste, plastics, and related topics.

The page outlines the support responsibility for persons in the asylum and refugee sector in Switzerland, detailing legal foundations, explanations, jurisdiction, and practice aids. It includes information on asylum law, temporary protection, and support measures for refugees.

The page details the project "Selbst organisiertes Lernen (SOL)" at gymnasial middle schools in the Canton of Zürich, focusing on the development of self-organized learning methods. It includes information about the project's goals, implementation, evaluation, and recommendations for future development.

The page provides information on additional documents required for educational authorization in various professions, including dental assistants, medical practice assistants, and logistics specialists. It includes specific requirements for each profession, such as copies of diplomas, work certificates, and permits.

The page provides information on how to access open geodata sets of the Canton of Zürich through the GIS-Browser or Geoservices (WMS, WFS, WCS). It includes links to guides, documentation, and legal foundations related to geoinformation.

The page provides information on training programs for school leaders in the Canton of Zürich. It includes details about various educational and mentoring programs, training offers, and a handbook for school authorities and school leaders, mainly offered by the Pädagogische Hochschule Zürich (PHZH).

The page provides detailed information on the Cantonal and Government Council elections in Zürich, held on February 12, 2023. It includes information on the election procedure, results, distribution of seats, voting methods, legal foundations, and downloadable documents related to the elections.
